text: Tangada madua e hagaingoo bolo Oholah23.4 Oholah: Di ingoo deenei dono hadinga i nnelekai Hebrew boloo, “dono gowaa dabu”. (mee e pono Samaria) gei tangada dulii e hagaingoo bolo Oholibah23.4 Oholibah: Di ingoo deenei dono hadinga i nnelekai Hebrew boloo, “dogu gowaa dabu e i lodo o mee”. (mee e pono Jerusalem). Au gu hai lodo gi meemaa dogolua, guu hai nau dama mai gi di Au.
